channel.title: Watchbar filter active on Popular-View
channel.description: JustWatch shows you all movies you can watch on Netflix, Disney+, Amazon Prime, and 200+ other streaming services.

item.description: Trying to leave their troubled lives behind, twin brothers return to their hometown to start again, only to discover that an even greater evil is waiting to welcome them back.
item.title: Sinners
item.author: noreply@www.justwatch.com

item.description: Unlikely hero Mickey Barnes finds himself in the extraordinary circumstance of working for an employer who demands the ultimate commitment to the job… to die, for a living.
item.title: Mickey 17
item.author: noreply@www.justwatch.com

item.description: When his beloved wife is suspected of betraying the nation, an intelligence agent faces the ultimate test – loyalty to his marriage or his country.
item.title: Black Bag
item.author: noreply@www.justwatch.com

item.description: When Cardinal Lawrence is tasked with leading one of the world's most secretive and ancient events, selecting a new Pope, he finds himself at the center of a web of conspiracies and intrigue that could shake the very foundation of the Catholic Church.
item.title: Conclave
item.author: noreply@www.justwatch.com

ofeed:disclaimers.ofeed:message: This feed will only be populated with JustWatch titles posted after it was first generated.
